name: Play Dough
description:
Collect all the delicious chocolate chips!  For the best results, play in fullscreen!

This is a co-op puzzle game for 2 players on the same computer. Find yourselves a handy piece of cardboard or some other divider so you can't look at each other's half of the screen and try to get through!

Left player uses Mouse Drag to move towers. Right player uses Shift to rotate and Space to move.

Will you succeed or crumble under pressure?
